body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Christopher Evans and the customer's name is Susan Stewart.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Christopher Evans. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Christopher, I'm Susan Stewart. I'm feeling quite frustrated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Susan. Can you tell me what has been causing your frustration?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I ordered a motorcycle three weeks ago and it hasn't arrived yet.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that could be frustrating. Let's get to the bottom of this. Can I have your order number to start?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my order number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Susan. Could you also please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s five five five, two one two, three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for that. Let me check the status of your order and see what the delay is.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Christopher. I really hope to hear some good news.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I will do my best to find out what's happening. Thank you for your time, Susan. I'll update you shortly!
